original_text: During the time Mordecai was sitting at the king’s gate, Bigthana and Teresh, two of the king’s officers who guarded the doorway, became angry and conspired to assassinate King Xerxes.
korean_text: 모르드개가 대궐 문에 앉았을 때에 문을 지키던 왕의 내시 빅단과 데레스 두 사람이 원한을 품고 아하수에로 왕을 암살하려는 음모를 꾸미는 것을

sentences.original_text: During the time Mordecai was sitting at the king's gate
sentences.korean_translation: 모르드개가 왕의 문에 앉아 있던 동안에

sentences.original_text: Bigthana and Teresh, two of the king's officers
